comment: This app works with the LG V20 phone and allows you full video viewing on the LG sport smartwatch while the LG V20 is video recording. I.E. True remote shutter video recording and full viewing in real time. Thank you for making this app. I tried all the other ones pay and free, and none of them allowed real time remote viewing while recording. One thing to note, is that you need to swipe right when you want to close the app. If you force close via the middle button on the smartwatch, the app will get a little buggy and you 'll need to restart the app twice and swipe one time to get the real time video to sync again. Please continue to improve this app. It works!
